title: Performance-Based CAD/CAM Foundational Education Course

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Engineering Knowledge and Basic Computer Application Skills
context.additional_context: Customized course for pre-service and in-service teachers to strengthen foundational CAD/CAM competencies. Practitioner-oriented design considering job applicability.

learning_goals: Learners can create 2D/3D drawings using CAD software and implement design models reflecting engineering requirements.
Learners can generate machining paths and perform CNC machine simulations using CAM systems.
Learners complete individual projects according to performance-based evaluation criteria and explain the integrated CAD/CAM process.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
